name: Happy Piggy Farm 2
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 52 in 48h.

You are a pig collecting apples on the farm. Collect as many apples as you can everyday to be deemed as a useful worker.

Controls:
WASD to move. Left Mouse Button to Jump. Right Mouse Button to shoot rock.

Background musics and sound effects are from the following Unity Assets:

  •    Ultimate Game Music Collection
  •    Ultimate SFX Bundle - HD Remaster
  •    Universal Sound FX
  •    Interface and Item Sounds

Thank you for playing tho game
